name: Safer Internet Center Iceland
goal: Empower children and parents to enjoy the internet and new media in a safe and positive way. Our emphasis is awareness work on net-ethics, computer game rating, source criticism, uses of mobile phones and personal protection on the internet.
interests: Digital economy and society, Education and training, Research and innovation, Youth
euInitiatives: CEF - Connecting European Facilities Telecom Call - Safer Internet (CEF - TC - 2018 - 1)
